## TransformNode.validate() method

Validates the node state and input type compatibility

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected validate(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Error message if invalid, empty string if valid

## Remarks

Validates that the input types are compatible for multiplication: - vec2 with mat2 - vec3 with mat3 - vec4 with mat4 - Compatible matrix-matrix multiplications
